Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-31147 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.17.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-31147 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.17.1-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs18 is earlier than 18.17.1-2, affected by CVE-2023-31147
